Articles.Content:
i was edditing the nodes and configs when all of a sudden the parts stopped loading and the game refuses to load,  i get the error  

[Exception]: NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object

[Exception]: FormatException: Input string was not in the correct format

and i have since recompiled the part in unity and replaced the config
Did you adjust particle shaders? If you use two different shaders at once this will happen.
there is only one material per part...
just to clarifyy can you not have additive particles AND non pareticle shaders together?
ive removed the adative texture i favor of translucent but it still wont load

Can we see a screenshot of your Unity scene? As well as your full part cfg? (you can paste it into a code block using the <> button on the post formatting toolbar). Also, if you're running other dependencies (such as Firespitter) I would recommend perhaps trying to remove the non-stock modules and then see if one of them is causing the issue.
